actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XII of the Public Health Service Act to provide for demonstration programs relating to emergency health care for children.
short_title: Emergency Child Health Services Act of 1983
subjects: Federal aid to child health services
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to child health services

summary.text: Emergency Child Health Services Act of 1983 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants for demonstration programs for children's emergency medical services. Sets forth eligibility requirements. Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to report to Congress by January 1, 1987, regarding such programs. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1984 through 1986.

titles.title: Emergency Child Health Services Act of 1983
A bill to amend title XII of the Public Health Service Act to provide for demonstration programs relating to emergency health care for children.
